Conversations/Bank/Landen/Museum Lines/c: Don't you think he looks a bit like me, [Ari]?
The other day, I was looking at that $Caldosian Emperor Bust$, over in the antiquities section of the museum.
Conversations/Bank/Landen/Museum Lines/s: On many a winter evening, Terithia and I would join Errol to roast up the Sweetroot he brought back from his day in the Mines. Warmed you right up!
That $Sweetroot$ in the museum's collection took me back!
